title: File a Lobbyist Activity Report
description: A registered lobbyist is filing their required monthly report of their activities and expenditures.

tasks.description: Identify the lobbyist and the correct reporting period.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lobbyist logs in and selects the correct month for their report.

tasks.description: Enter details of all lobbying contacts and any related expenditures.
tasks.expected_outcome: The lobbyist accurately fills out the disclosure form.
The lobbyist successfully files their monthly disclosure.
